```{r golbal, context = "data"}

all_res_df = read_csv("shiny_data/inspection_sub_all_date.csv") %>%
  nest(inspection_detail = action:critical_flag) %>% 
  mutate(price_count = str_count(price, fixed("$")))

latest_res_df = read_csv("shiny_data/inspection_sub_latest_date.csv") %>%
  nest(inspection_detail = action:critical_flag)%>% 
  mutate(price_count = str_count(price, fixed("$"))) %>% 
  drop_na()

cuisine_list = 
  all_res_df %>% 
  select(cuisine_description) %>% 
  count(cuisine_description) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  select(cuisine_description) %>% 
  add_row(cuisine_description = "Others") %>%
  pull()

price_list = c(
  "$ <10",
  "$$ 10-30",
  "$$$ 31-60",
  "$$$$ >60"
)

sort_list_1 = c(
  "distance", 
  "rating", 
  "price",
  "inspection date"
)

sort_list_2 = c(
  "rating", 
  "price",
  "inspection date"
)

```

```{r user_input}
selectInput(
  inputId = "boro_choice",
  label = "Select borough",
  choices = all_res_df %>% distinct(boro) %>% pull()
)

textInput(
  inputId = "street", 
  label = "Street (Optional)")

# reactive(input$street)

selectInput(
  inputId = "cuisince_choice",
  label = "Select cuisine type", 
  choice = cuisine_list
)

sliderInput(
  inputId = "rating_range",
  label = "Choose rating range",
  min = 0.0, max = 5.0, value = c(1.0, 5.0), step = 0.1, round = -2
)

sliderTextInput(
  inputId = "price_range",
  label = "Choose price range" , 
  choices = price_list, 
  selected = c(price_list[1], price_list[4])
)



sliderInput(
  "inspection_range",
  label = "Choose inspection score range",
  min = 0, max = 100, value = c(0, 100)
)


sort_list = sort_list_2
actionButton(
  "search_button", "Search"
)
```

Column {data-width= 700}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Result

```{r}
get_coord <- function(url) {
  
  tryCatch({
    json_output <- fromJSON(url(url))$features
    coord <- json_output$geometry[2]
    return(unlist(coord[1,]))
  }, 
  
  error=function(e){
    return(c(0, 0))
  })
  
}

target_coord = eventReactive(
  input$search_button, 
  get_coord(paste0("https://geosearch.planninglabs.nyc/v1/search?text=", url_encode(input$street), "&size=1"))
)


get_dist <- function(coord1, coord2) {
  dist = ifelse(coord1 == c(0, 0), "NA" , round(distm(coord1, coord2, fun = distHaversine)[,1]/1609, digits = 1) %>% as.character())
  return(dist[1])
}

res_table = 
  eventReactive(
    input$search_button,
    latest_res_df  %>% 
    filter(boro == input$boro_choice, 
      cuisine_description ==  input$cuisince_choice, 
      rating %in% seq(input[["rating_range"]][1],input[["rating_range"]][2],0.1),
      price_count %in% str_count(input$price_range[1],fixed("$")):str_count(input$price_range[2], fixed("$")), 
      score %in% input$inspection_range[1]:input$inspection_range[2])%>% 
      mutate(
        coord = map2(longitude, latitude, ~c(.x, .y)), 
        distance = map(coord, ~get_dist(target_coord(), .x)[1])
        ) 
)
 

renderDataTable(
  res_table() %>%
    select(dba, building, street, rating, price, score, distance) %>% 
    arrange(desc(rating)) %>% 
    rename(name = dba, inspection = score) ,
      options = list(
        scrollX = TRUE,
        scrollY = "500px"
      )
)



```

### Map

```{r}
res_map = 
  eventReactive(
    input$search_button,
    latest_res_df  %>% 
    filter(boro == input$boro_choice, 
      cuisine_description ==  input$cuisince_choice, 
      rating %in% seq(input[["rating_range"]][1],input[["rating_range"]][2],0.1),
      price_count %in% str_count(input$price_range[1],fixed("$")):str_count(input$price_range[2], fixed("$")), 
      score %in% input$inspection_range[1]:input$inspection_range[2])%>% 
      mutate(
        coord = map2(longitude, latitude, ~c(.x, .y)), 
        distance = map(coord, ~get_dist(target_coord(), .x)[1]), 
        info = str_c(dba, " (", rating,", ", price,  ")\n", building, " ", street)
        ) 
)

renderLeaflet({
    leaflet(res_map()) %>%
      # addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerLite,
      #   options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)
      # ) %>%
    addTiles() %>% addCircleMarkers(lng=~longitude, lat=~latitude, label = ~dba, popup=~ info, radius = 3, color = "red", fillOpacity = ~rating)
  })

```
